Head.Title: JRE
Head.Description: Do what I enjoy and enjoy life.

Hero: Devoted to developing products that are beloved by users.

About.Title: Introduction
About.SubTitle: About Technology
About.Description: I have over a year of experience in the frontend field, and below are the technologies I have used or am currently learning.

Portfolio.Title: Portfolio
Portfolio.SubTitle: Learning by doing
Portfolio.TomoyaJRE: This is my first personal website. Its purpose is to have a space to record my experiences and learning in front-end development, and also to shorten the time cost for others to get to know me.
Portfolio.MaskMap: During the first interview, I realized that I didn't have a concept of state management. Therefore, I spent two weeks using the Vuex framework to implement this project and understand and familiarize myself with state management.
Portfolio.EasyEat: This is my first project, with the aim of becoming a front-end engineer! I hope to establish a solid foundation in CSS, so most of the styles on this website are hand-coded.

Journey.Title: Learning Journey
Journey.SubTitle: My experience in the software industry.

SelfTaught.Title: Self-Taught Programming
Points: Purchase Hexschool's courses to learn front-end skills through self-study.
Buy books from Tenlong Bookstore to learn JavaScript and Vue.
Learn HTML and CSS by watching Amos's tutorial videos on YouTube.

FrontEndDeveloper.Title: Front-end Developer
Points: Responsible for developing and maintaining the front-end and back-end of a food ordering website project.
Develop a reservation service and integrate Line LIFF and calendar functions to provide users with a more convenient booking experience.
Integrate JKO Pay payment system with JKO APP service to provide a more diverse payment method.
Integrate Bank SinoPac's payment system and develop a stored value service that includes QR code scanning, stored value plans, and other related services.

Relearning.Title: Learning
Points: Purchase the Next.js course on Udemy to learn about SSR, SSG, ISR, and API Routes related knowledge.
Purchase the React course on HiSKIO to learn about React, React Router, and Redux related knowledge.
Purchase the Three.js course on Three.js Journey to learn the basics of creating 3D websites.
Learn how to create animations using Framer Motion by watching tutorial videos on YouTube and reading the official documentation.
Build a personal website and start developing a personal brand in the software industry.

WorkExperience.Title: Work Experience
WorkExperience.SubTitle: DAMAI Internet
Description: Developing and maintaining the front-end and back-end of an online food ordering system for approximately 3,000 restaurants.
Individually creating the iMenu reservation system and its back-end, currently used by approximately 80 restaurants.
Integrating StreetPay payment system for both web and app interfaces, currently used by approximately 161 restaurants.
Developing the front-end for integrating and working with E.SUN bank and MyWallet payment systems.
Optimizing iMenu's menu image rendering issue, improving FPS from 15 to 55.
Optimizing front-end project packaging, reducing size from 1719KiB to 544KiB.

Roger.Testimonial: Attending this book club has allowed me to deeply appreciate the power of collective thinking! Every time, I am able to hear new ideas and inspirations. Through this exchange and learning, it enables me to accelerate and maintain a passionate approach to learning new skills.
Roger.Name: Roger

Jim.Testimonial: It made me realize that if I persist, even just a little bit, I can achieve significant results in a few months. Through the process of teaching and learning, I am able to see my blind spots and strengths more clearly, and feedback is also important.
Jim.Name: Jim

Karol.Testimonial: Reading group provides motivation for me to understand unfamiliar knowledge, teaches me how to express myself in a simple and clear way through presentations, and allows me to learn from members' explanations and try to think from different perspectives. It is a happy time where we can grow together with our peers.
Karol.Name: Karol

Contact.Title: Contact Me
Contact.SubTitle: If you have any questions for me, please feel free to contact me.
